overview: Vim is a highly configurable text editor that is popular for its efficiency and extensibility. It provides a modal editing interface that allows users to navigate and edit text quickly using keyboard shortcuts and powerful features. Vim is widely used for programming, editing configuration files, and various text editing tasks.
core_features: Modal editing with normal, insert, visual, and command modes
Extensive customizability through plugins and configuration settings
Syntax highlighting and code completion for various programming languages
Efficient movement and editing commands for text manipulation
